sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Nonresident College Trustees Act.

sections.heading: (a) In all colleges, universities and other
sections.text:
institutions of learning in the State of Illinois, not placed under the
control of the officers of this State, whether organized under any general
or special law, non-residents of this State shall be eligible to the office
of trustee; provided, that at least 3 members of the board of
trustees
of any such institution of learning shall be residents of this State. This
subsection (a) does not apply to the Board of Trustees of the
University of Illinois,
Southern Illinois University, Chicago State University, Eastern Illinois
University,
Governors State University, Illinois State University, Northeastern Illinois
University,
Northern Illinois University, or Western Illinois University.
